entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.Numerics.Tests.WorkItemExecution failure terminate the process because of out of memory #90439
  • Build Failure on MacOS ARM64 Rid issue with sqlite #90434
  • Clean up ifdefs in EventSource #90433
    9.0.0
  • Attributes.OnlyKeepUsed.NullableOnConstraints failing in dotnet-linker-tests #90431
  • Re-enable ARM64 Mono-fullAOT LLVM lane #90427
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Forward sub does not kick in in some physical promotion cases #90426
    9.0.0
  • Mono arm64 runtime does not correctly return structs that contain a pointer type #90423
    8.0.0
  • The AOT compiler doesn't support a MONO_PATH with a colon #90422
  • Perf pipeline completely broken - `No matching distribution found for pip<22.0` #90420
  • [API Proposal]: 'System.Memory' Add PositionOf with 'ReadOnlySpan<T> value' argument function #90419
  • New "an operation is not legal in the current state" failures from Type.GetType #90415
  • IOS TestFlight Non-public API usage error ITMS-90338 for __dyld_find_unwind_sections using NativeAOT #90408
    9.0.0
  • Http: ActivityHeadersPropagator=null suppresses HttpClient tracing #90407
  • EventSource use of EventAttribute triggers dynamic methods in attribute usage #90405
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Consider switching to C11 #90404
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector64::ExtractMostSignificantBits on ARM64 #90402
    Future
  • Annotate remaining libraries for Nullable Reference Types #90400
    Future
  • [mono] Add support to load compressed PE files #90399
    9.0.0
  • InlineArray[Valid]/[Invalid] Runtime tests are failing for Mono miniJIT and interpreter #90398
    8.0.0
  • [Proposal] Introduce a transpilable C# language/.NET runtime subset specialized for native library wrappers #90397
  • Mono crashes in mono_reflection_get_custom_attrs_data_checked when running under Instruments Leaks profiler #90394
    9.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter serialization does not roundtrip with IConvertible fields #90387
  • ObjectDisposedException intermittently crashes test process from DefaultHttpClientFactory.ExpiryTimer_Tick #90386
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failing `Loader/classloader/InlineArray` on android-x64 #90384
  • [ NativeAOT ] EXEC : error : VTable of type 'ListEnumerator`1<ClassLibrary1.Foo>' not computed by the IL scanner. You can work around by running the compilation with scanner disabled. #90382
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_compiler->lvaInSsa(tree->GetLclNum())' during 'Assertion prop' #90377
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator and LibraryImportGenerator tests fail on linux-arm with "symbol lookup error: /root/helix/work/workitem/e/Microsoft.Interop.Tests.NativeExportsNE.so: undefined symbol: __atomic_compare_exchange_4" #90376
  • Runtime_90219 fails on Mono #90374
    9.0.0
  • Runtime_76273 fails on Mono #90372
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add `mono-aot-cross --print-runtime-icall-table` to the cross compiler nuget #90366
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Setting Proxy for HttpClient Instance Used for CRL Checks #90363
  • [mono] enable_checked_build_thread trigger warning as error #90362
  • [External] Libunwind has suppressed warnings #90359
  • ProvideCorrectArgumentsToFormattingMethodsAnalyzer throws IndexOutOfRangeException when building Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #90357
  • IntrinsicsInSystemPrivateCoreLibAnalyzer throwing ArgumentException #90356

Closed

  • LibraryImport cannot handle a property named "System" #90299
    8.0.0
  • Support Meter and Instrument Tags in MetricsEventSource #87150
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Crashes in AOT mode When Referencing SkiaSharp (Regression in NET8-preview.2) #83970
    8.0.0
  • MAUI iOS Release mode crash: Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper delegate-invoke) bool <Module>:invoke_callvirt_bool_SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid (Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid)' while running in aot-only mode #83212
    8.0.0
  • oData Client "JIT compile method in AOT mode" error when build to IOS device #76261
    8.0.0
  • `__icall_wrapper_ves_icall_mono_delegate_ctor` can lead to SIGSEGV on iOS with `MtouchInterpreter=-all` #89359
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Investigate the issue with trimming Mono.Android.dll #90403
    9.0.0
  • IOException running NuGet-Migrations during tests in dotnet CLI first run #80619
    8.0.0
  • Enable dotnet/runtime runtime and functional tests for iOS platforms to run with NativeAOT #85294
    8.0.0
  • Single-file host tracing should include version and/or commit hash #80961
    8.0.0
  • Failure to create an XmlSerializer throws an unhelpful exception #87944
    8.0.0
  • XmlSerializer: provide more details in error message "Compiling JScript/CSharp scripts is not supported" #81613
    8.0.0
  • [browser] single file JavaScript and custom loader #89510
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor, or console template with AOT/relinking fails with: `mono_wasm_load_runtime () failed Error: unreachable` #90111
    8.0.0
  • CI build failure: Bash exited with code '1' failure - Could NOT find ZLIB #86324
    9.0.0
  • [coreCLR] Tests failing due to undefined symbol in `Microsoft.Interop.Tests.NativeExportsNE.so` #90380
  • [mono] FullAOT runtime test failures: Attempting to JIT compile method #57350
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Runtime tests failing with 'Attempting to JIT compile method' for Mono FullAOT mode #70492
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' during 'Generate code' #78614
    8.0.0
  • Invalid codegen for Vector512 arithmetic right shift operator (>>) #89338
    8.0.0
  • AVX-512 debugger support: breakpoints #87843
    8.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in tracing infrastructure when build is running ILC while ETW is enabled #88081
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Meter Configuration and Pipeline #85684
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializerOptionsNoTypeInfoResolverSpecified after upgrading from .NET 8 Preview 6 to 7 (release mode only) #90395
  • Unexpected depth mapping of Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #90252
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128:ExtractMostSignificantBits on ARM64 and AMD64 #76025
    9.0.0
  • Add Function Pointer support to Mono Reflection #71095
    8.0.0
  • PEReader.GetPESectionBlock() cache ineffective (calls mmap+munmap for every call) #53080
    8.0.0
  • .net7 HRESULT: 0x8007000E on linux with read-only fs #86259
    8.0.0
  • Warn on analyzer crashes in runtime repo #78412
    8.0.0
  • Validate that the new snake/kebab case naming policies match the Json.NET implementation. #77309
    8.0.0
  • Add an msbuild property that toggles the `XmlResolver.IsNetworkingEnabledByDefault` feature switch #89877
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] EncryptDecrypt_Span.RsaCryptRoundtrip_OaepSHA512 throws CryptographicException : Unknown error #90381
  • [perf] System.Linq.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89248
    9.0.0
  • Provide a way to reset an ArrayBufferWriter without clearing the underlying memory #49134
    8.0.0
  • .net8 preview4 AOT windows service process, log component always writes to ETW #87769
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure on Debug build #90341
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Regressions/Github/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219.sh #79807
    8.0.0
  • [Crossgen2] Stack overflow in Crossgen2 compilation of the test src/tests/Loader/classloader/generics/regressions/DD117522/Test.csproj #89645
    8.0.0
  • Does .NET support NUMA core processing? #58184
    Future
  • Tracking issue for Core Runtime HouseKeeping Items #58120
    8.0.0
  • [browser] do native build when preserving native symbols #85778
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 GA Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #79245
    8.0.0
  • Run ServiceController.Start(serviceName) throw exception access is denied #75554
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RequiresLocationAttribute (supporting ref readonly parameters) #85910
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make AddBinaryFormattedResource obsolete #88217
    8.0.0
  • Socket UDP test failures due to endpoint mismatches #90125
    8.0.0
  • Announcement: Extending API review process #74273
    8.0.0
  • CMake error on ios+NativeAOT running smoke tests #90312
  • [coreclr] Native AOT runtime and functional tests on apple mobile report undefined symbols for architecture arm64 #90218
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Add more blazor tests for InvariantGlobalization #90440
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix condition for setting if symbol is a file in native AOT publish targets #90438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • DCS work nicely with collectible AssemblyLoadContext #90437
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove a little work from CreateManifestAndDescriptors #90435
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [NativeAOT] Do not use private APIs on iOS/macOS #90430
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • support SslStream SSLKEYLOGFILE in debug builds #90429
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • Update DNNE #90425
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Enable callconv and classloader runtime tests #90421
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Disable InlineArrayValid and InlineArrayInvalid tests on android-x64 #90414
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Remove experimental off of librarybuilder workload #90410
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90409
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove all use of <Nullable>annotations</Nullable> #90401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Fix Typos #90396
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • CodeDom null annotations fixes #90393
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • [browser] smaller prefetch file set #90388
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Use non-generic `Memmove` for pointers in `String` #90383
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [DependencyInjection] Avoid useless reflection call in ActivatorUtilities #90378
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [ppc64le] Performance improvements while branching during function calls #90367
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Respect `AppendRuntimeIdentifierToOutputPath`, and `UseArtifactsOutput` #90365
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add System.Threading.Thread.UseAllCpuGroups runtimeconfig switch #90360
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Prefix type names with global and use static TypeSyntax and NameSyntax instead of Parse(Type)Name #90339
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support Exposing new Metric properties using EventSource #90417
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix builds for blazor app + InvariantGlobalization=true #90432
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90342
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve System.Text.Json configuration list debugging #90411
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable Automatic Reference Counting (ARC) for Objective-C code that needs it #90379
    area-Meta, os-mac-os-x
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Update perf run yaml with changes for crank on helix (#90368)" #90424
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Use generated version files when printing/tracing host version info #90273
    area-Single-File
  • [mono] Enabled tests failing previously on fullaot #90280
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Allow JS modules to be injected as pre-loaded assets #90392
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser] bind JS methods to minified WASM imports #90145
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Delete duplicative fallback paths from Ascii #90390
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Disable LLVM AOT ARM64 lane #90413
    needs-area-label
  • Added ArrayBufferWriter<T>.ResetWrittenCount() #88009
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Replace Utf16Utility.GetPointerToFirstInvalidChar fallback with Vector128 #90391
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 8.0.0
  • Support breakpoints on AVX-512 instructions #89705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use crossplat vectors in GetPointerToFirstInvalidChar #90373
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 8.0.0
  • Add metrics configuration APIs #90201
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable floats in Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits on arm64 and amd64 #90304
  • [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Ensure GetPESectionBlock uses its cache #90369
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Do not generate internal archives #90050
    area-Setup
  • [mono] Cleanup DISABLED_FEATURES variable #90375
    area-Build-mono
  • Make Analyzer crashes a warning #90358
    area-Meta
  • Rework SnakeCase/KebabCase naming policies to closer match Json.NET's #90316
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable R2R for NarrowUtf16ToAscii / WidentAsciiToUtf16 #90361
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Make getStaticFieldContent less conservative for struct with gc fields #90162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update perf run yaml with changes for crank on helix #90368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89620
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89619
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add missing GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED #90355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix Shuffling Thunks part 1 #90266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix for #89645, stack overflow in Crossgen2 #90229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix up conditions to trigger relink, and require `wasm-tools` workload #89754
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose the RequiresLocationAttribute #89870
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mark AddBinaryFormattedResource obsolete #90346
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • only slice SocketAddress on success operation #90284
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Add support for MONO_DEBUG_VAR_ADDRESS_MODE_VTADDR in set_var #90330
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Fix iOS nativeaot runtime test build #90327
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement Edit and Continue on Linux and MacOS #90349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #90049
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #90053
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • Fixing COM Aggregation and XAML reference tracking on .NET AOT #90283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Incremental build improvements #90194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Unspill normalize-on-load variables using exact small type #90318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DiagnosticDescriptorHelper to set HelpURI for generator / analyzer diagnostics #90353
    area-Meta
  • Ensure that constant folding for long->float is handled correctly #90325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Do not use `select(2)` on debugger-agent #90293
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support calling `get_Item` passing decimal, float or double as parameter. #90260
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [workloads] Add telemetry for mobile and wasm workloads #90208
    area-Build-mono
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • TypeLoadException thrown from MetadataLoadContext should expose TypeName #90268
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Reenable properties disabled in illink.targets #90231
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DependencyInjection] Use '==' instead of 'Equals()` to test service type equality #90334
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fixed Enumerator variable null check #89920
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Symbolicate function names on debug callstack #90348
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser
  • Test calling `Problem()` test. #90296
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Switch DateTimeKind from Unspecified to Local #90149
    area-System.Management, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Evaluate a sum between an object and a string #90175
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Support invoke of function pointer type arg #90270
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Blazor] Custom ICU loading from runtime path #90236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] WIP `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • What is the expected behavior when a reference is missing? #90261
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #89502
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add check for tizen in ilc and crossgen2 #90310
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Prevent generic context runaway during inlining of polymorphic recursive methods #90306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90343
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2241323 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Avoid string allocation and improve performance of `JsonProperty.WriteTo` #90074
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • GenAPI does not correctly handle System.Runtime #34427
  • NETSDK1206 warns on platforms that should be vaild when project has no `FrameworkReference` #34003

Updated

  • File used by another process #33956
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Merge installer repo into SDK #24415
    Backlog
  • NETSDK1206 error when building the aspnetcore repo with latest 8.0 Preview 6 SDK build #33486
    Discussion
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716
  • dotnet CLI: Consolidate `dotnet workload` command messages #34417

PullRequests

Created

  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Containers: 8.0.1xx readme notes #33945
    Area-Containers
  • Update minimumMSBuildVersion to 17.7.0 #34565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Don't fire NETSDK1206 if known RID platforms were not determined #34021
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add feature switch to control XmlResolver.IsNetworkingEnabledByDefault #34412
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create default.json file #34414
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [CEO]: [@DIEJ4COB] #7449

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expressions: limit proposal to C#12 only #7450
  • Update collection-expressions.md #7455
  • Create CL-2023-08-10.md #7453
  • Update Compiler-synthesized-types.md #7454
  • Create Compiler-synthesized-types.md #7452
  • Update `ref readonly` parameters proposal #7350

Updated

  • Create spec for lambda params with modifiers without type name #7369

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Release cycle on NuGet should be aligned with VS releases #69478
  • LanguageVersionExtensions needs to map special values to specific versions before comparing values #69477

Closed

  • Suboptimal code for non-linear is-pattern expressions compared to switch #59615
    Compiler.Next
  • Pattern matching causing redundant jumps in generated IL (maybe a bug, maybe a good reason?) #55334
  • Odd active statement location #54758
    17.6 P2
  • [F12 GTD Source Link] F12 does not fall back to decompilation if Source Link/Embedded file lookup has exception. #69371
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Report less errors on bad closing parentheses inside a local function #69479
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add BuildOnlyDiagnosticIds LSP request handler #69475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Complete `ref readonly` test plan #69474
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

Merged

  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code like `ImmutableArray.Create(1, 2, 3)` to `[1, 2, 3]` #69473
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Consolidate rude edit reporting #69463
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Verify synthesized `RequiresLocationAttribute` cannot be accessed by fnptrs #69328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next

Updated

  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #69469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Document and test `ref readonly` breaking change #69437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Fix lack of constructor exit warnings in copy constructors #69468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Skip AddImport calculation for source generated doc #69451
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • IDE changes for analyzer loading #69470
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Unify `ref readonly` with `in` parameter behavior where it currently differs #69235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AuthorizeView component does not work correctly without setting the Roles property #50030
  • Quickgrid PropertyColumn Align property doesn't work with Align.Right #50029
  • Blazor Web App Template NavMenu Component is Missing Render Attribute - Click Events Do Not Get Fired #50028
    8.0-rc2
  • Session timeout on external OAuth OIDC provider causes internal server error: message.State is null or empty #50026
  • Razor Pages routing breaks when creating web host from separate project #50024
  • Custom password sign in flow #50023
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #50018
  • PageTitle Not Updating #50017

Closed

  • Lack of button types in header of QuickGrid #45216
    8.0-rc1
  • Checkbox Tag-Helper ignores form attribute when hidden input is generated #49201
    8.0-rc1
  • Blazor page does not display with SVG #49447
    8.0-rc1
  • Remove IRoutingStateProvider or bring it back #49084
    8.0-rc1
  • StreamRendering and RenderModeServer causes OnInitialized to be invoked twice. Second time query parameter not bound. #49612
    8.0-rc2
  • Closed issue even though it is not resolved? #49997
  • JsonSerializerOptionsNoTypeInfoResolverSpecified after upgrading from .NET 8 Preview 6 to 7 (release mode only) #50025

PullRequests

Created

  • Add benchmarking documentation #50027
    Docs, needs-area-label
  • [blazor][E2E test] BootResourceCachingTest.IncrementallyUpdatesCache faster #50021
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • GetDocumentInsider: use System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource from runtime (not OOB) #50020
    area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *
  • Set form options for form-based request types #50016
    area-middleware

Merged

  • Combine email and username in MapIdentityApi #49981
    area-identity, 8.0-rc1
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • fix: Account for form attribute on checkbox tag input helper #49201 #49323
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering, 8.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `455fcb7` to `7e33b6a` #50022
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Use pre-boxed values in diagnostics #50013
    area-mvc, 8.0-rc1
  • Clean up more of SERVER_PROCESS #50015
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Add tests and fix exception handling in form binding #49983
    area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix a typo in EndpointRoutingApplicationBuilderExtensions #49995
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Manual reflection based page discovery #49757
    area-blazor
  • Watch file-based certificates for changes #49979
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Allow enhanced navigation when an interactive router is present #50012
    area-blazor
  • Extend `PersistKeysToDbContext` (#49329) #50011
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Synchronize KestrelTrace next-id comments #49964
    area-runtime
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add EditContext.IsValid(..) to determine if a field has any associated validation messages #48698
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2241713 #49575
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Testing] Modify our CI Template Tests so that TreatWarningsAsErrors is enabled #16709
    .NET 8 GA
  • Shell.TitleView still doesn't work in iPhone even with 7.0.92 #16707
  • Resizing the window causes rare flickering #16702
  • [Android] Unloaded event is incorrectly raised during navigation for a view in a custom layout #16697
    Backlog
  • : WindowsPackageType is set to None, but GenerateAppxPackageOnBuild is set to true. #16696
  • Visual Studio Compatibility with MAUI Blazor RTL Layout #16694
  • ListView can not grow on iOS #16689

Closed

  • iOS and MacOS - ContentView (CustomControl) inside Grid Row, makes only the last item in the row clickable #16705
  • Referencing a Maui Library in a Maui App causes Apt2144 on Android build. on 7.0.400 SDK #16680
    Backlog
  • MAUI sdk should default the JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property to true #16038
    .NET 8 GA
  • In ios 16 remotely with an emulator, when I open the application it appears on a black screen and the app closes. #16703
  • Button control's BackgroundColor property not update properly with Trigger. #16693
  • CollectionView bounces/wobbles when values are updated on Android #16546
  • [regression/7.0] RefreshView issue #14585
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView on windows no longer resizes width when resizing window #13924
    .NET 8 GA
  • Items in CollectionView using GridItemsLayout not sized correctly (content gets clipped) #16115
    Backlog
  • Cannot upgrade Xamarin to MAUI - VS 2022 for Mac #16446
  • Moving MAUI Window between monitors with different scalling has issues #14597
    .NET 8 GA
  • Window glitches when dragging app between monitors with different scaling #11777
    .NET 8 GA
  • Error NETSDK1032: The RuntimeIdentifier platform 'osx-arm64' and the PlatformTarget 'x64' must be compatible. #16673
  • ContentPage.Background (with LinearGradientBrush) not working for iOS #16537
  • There should be a subscribable event for changes to the Map visible region #16556
  • Webauthenticator Apple Sign in #16602
  • After upgrading to Visual Studio 2022 Preview to 17.8.0 Empty MAUI App does not compile #16652
  • There was a problem that the Entry SoftKeyboard of Collectionview could not be hidden. (Android only) #16691
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_ScreenReader: Talkback is not announcing label information for slider, plus/minus button. #15623
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Update WebNavigationResult.cs doc comments #16710
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝
  • Enable default xcode path #16708
  • Document IElementHandler #16706
    area/docs 📓
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [ios] fix memory leak in WindowOverlay #16700
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [net7.0] Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16692
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16690
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #16695
  • Re-land "[Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing" #16637
    community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Use same type converter for Brush as for Color to enable XAML completion #16639
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16688
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Use the correct WASDK property #16683
    area/single project ☝️, backport/suggested
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #16681
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
    area/testing
  • Make Android visual test screenshots more deterministic #16591
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Picker #16685
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, control-dialog
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Display alerts on top of popups #16581
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [Housekeeping] Review all the pending TODOs comments related with .NET 8 #16670
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Correctly propagate the BindingContext to SwipeView Content #16632
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Make ImageSourcePartExtensions public #16633
    area/image :framed_picture:, t/housekeeping ♻︎, i/regression
  • Try Swizzling UIViews for better OnLoad #14342
  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, Under Consideration
